0.name: Gladiator's Finale
0.4bonus: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

1.name: Maiden Beloved
1.4bonus: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

2.name: Noblesse Oblige
2.4bonus: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

3.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
3.4bonus: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

4.name: Wanderer's Troupe
4.4bonus: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

5.name: Viridescent Venerer
5.4bonus: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

6.name: Thundering Fury
6.4bonus: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

7.name: Thundersoother
7.4bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.

8.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
8.4bonus: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

9.name: Lavawalker
9.4bonus: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.

10.name: Archaic Petra
10.4bonus: Upon obtaining a crystal created through a Geo Elemental Reaction, all party members gain 35% Elemental DMG Bonus to that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time. (the in-game description is incorrect)[1]

11.name: Retracing Bolide
11.2bonus: Increases the effectiveness of shields by 35%
11.4bonus: Gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG while under the protection of a shield.

12.name: Glacier and Snowfield (Currently unavailable)
12.4bonus: Increases Superconduct DMG by 50%. Increases Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Burst increases Cryo DMG by 25% for 10s.

13.name: Icebreaker (Currently unavailable)
13.4bonus: Increases DMG against enemies in a Frozen state or affected by cryo by 35%.

0.name: Instructor
0.4bonus: After causing an elemental reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s. (the in-game description is incorrect)

1.name: Berserker
1.4bonus: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

2.name: The Exile
2.4bonus: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

3.name: Resolution of Sojourner
3.4bonus: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

4.name: Martial Artist
4.2bonus: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
4.4bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

5.name: Defender's Will
5.4bonus: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party.

6.name: Tiny Miracle
6.4bonus: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

7.name: Brave Heart
7.4bonus: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.

8.name: Gambler
8.4bonus: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

9.name: Scholar
9.4bonus: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s.
